name: FamiTracker Module
summary: Learn about .FTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Musicians, game developers, and retro music enthusiasts who want to create or reproduce NES-style soundtracks are the primary users of FamiTracker and the FTM format. The program’s name, "FamiTracker," is derived from “Famicom Tracker,” referencing the original Japanese name for the NES, "Family Computer."

instructions: You can open FTM files with FamiTracker in Windows. To open an FTM file with FamiTracker, select File → Open. tildearrow Furnace can also open FTM files.
FamiTracker can convert FTM files to more common formats, such as .WAV for general playback or .NSF (NES Sound Format) for use in emulators or NES-compatible playback tools.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
